ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Respondent
Notes: 1 = Parent; 2 = Teacher; 3=Self; 4= Other; 5= Significant other; 6 = Parent 1; 7 = Parent 2; 999 = Not available

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: BASH Total Score
My friends would think I was crazy if I saw a therapist

ElementDescription: I'm concerned that I will miss drinking (for example, that I would miss getting drunk, miss my old lifestyle, or have cravings).
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Disagree; 5 = Strongly disagree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: Seeking help for an alcohol problem is something that is not accepted in my culture.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Disagree; 5 = Strongly disagree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: I'm concerned that people who tried to help me might not understand my cultural background.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Disagree; 5 = Strongly disagree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: I don't think I can find someone to talk to with the same racial/ethnic or cultural background as me.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Disagree; 5 = Strongly disagree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: I'm concerned about people finding out sensitive information about me, such as my immigration status.

ElementDescription: I'm afraid that seeking help will have negative consequences for the immigration status of someone in my family (like my parents, children).
